summary: The diff implements a Full Syllabus Test structure with backend data models, stable storage, API endpoints (create, retrieve, assign questions), admin-only authorization, React Query hooks, admin creation page, routing, and student dashboard integration. All 13 requirements (REQ-21 through REQ-33) appear to be addressed with corresponding backend and frontend changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module added in backend/migration.mo with upgrade logic for fullSyllabusTests and nextTestId
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement explicitly requested a migration module. REQ-22 only requires stable storage with stable variables; migration handling was not specified.

hallucinated_features.description: currentTestId variable in backend/main.mo (var currentTestId : ?Nat = null)
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement mentions tracking a 'current test' or maintaining currentTestId state. This variable appears unused in the provided diff.
